root.name: Dragon Ball Z: Collectible Card Game
root.description: The Dragonball Z Collectible Trading Card Game (CCG) puts you in command of the most powerful warriors ever, in the battle for Earth. The DBZgame is a collectible trading card game, like the Harry Potter TCG and the Young Jedi CCG. But this one features all your fave Dragonball Z fighters - Goku, Gohan, Piccolo, Vegeta, Android 17 and even the big bad dude himself - Cell. You play by choosing your Dragonball Z warrior and battling against friends who have their own Dragonball Z CCG cards.
